body_html:
The fix I found was just to install from sources. From anaconda it works but it's the .cuda() directive which take ages to execute. With libtcmalloc it works but it's my shell which go crazy.
At least from source everything work as expected 😄

body:
The fix I found was just to install from sources. From anaconda it works but it's the `.cuda()` directive which take ages to execute. With `libtcmalloc` it works but it's my shell which go crazy.
At least from source everything work as expected 😄
